sentences.english: Is it excrement floating in the air today?
sentences.chinese: 今天空气里是飘着屎吗？

sentences.english: There is something sub-human about Hindus, they thrive in sh'it.
sentences.chinese: 有一些是印度教徒，他们在屎中茁壮成长。

sentences.english: The results of drug-fast showed that tolerance of Streptococcus faecium was higher than that of Streptococcus faecalis.
sentences.chinese: 药敏结果显示屎肠球菌的耐药性高于粪肠球菌。

sentences.english: The icecream looks like a pile of shit.
sentences.chinese: 那里的冰淇淋看起来像一坨屎。

sentences.english: Mr Peters has the right to raise questions about the Government's immigration policy.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，痞得屎有权对政府的移民政策提出异议。

sentences.english: Objective: Study on characteristics and function for Entercoccus faecium viable bacteria preparations.
sentences.chinese: 对屎肠球菌活菌制剂的特性及功效进行研究和分析。

sentences.english: The small frozen stiff bird lay in the cow's excrement and discovered it was really too warm.
sentences.chinese: 冻僵的小鸟躺在牛屎堆里，发掘牛粪真是太温暖了。

sentences.english: Too bad he was three times my age and stank heavily of poo.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧的是他年龄是我的三倍大，而且身上屎臭熏天。

sentences.english: Is that shit in his hair?
Buddha said the previous five hundred review xiangshiyixiao only for this life the one slip away.
sentences.chinese: 佛说前屎媚五百次回眸才换来今死的一次涂肩而过。

sentences.english: I just took one of the biggest poops of my whole life.
sentences.chinese: 我只是拉了我人生中最大的一坨屎。

sentences.english: Become more trouble, why shit I eat excrement. So the teacher there and then faint…
sentences.chinese: 变成屎时多麻烦，为何当初不吃屎。

sentences.english: He knows not what love is that has no children.
sentences.chinese: 出有后屎媚人没有知讲甚么是爱。

sentences.english: The final bust-up came when I told him he was s*** at navigating.
sentences.chinese: 最后分手时我告诉他他在远行方面是一坨屎。

sentences.english: I've cleaned maggots out of other people's kitchens. I've scraped cat poop off carpets.
sentences.chinese: 我为别人清理过厨房的蛆虫，刮过地毯上的猫屎。

sentences.english: Stinky Tofu - smells like shit - tastes great.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，还有臭豆腐，闻起来像屎，味道却棒极了。
